About.title: About Vote Kori
About.subtitle: We help citizens learn democracy and vote with confidence.
About.mission: Vote Kori is a civic education platform for Bangladesh. We believe every voter should understand how democracy works, what their rights are, and how to cast an informed vote. Through short quizzes and certificates, we make learning about democracy simple and rewarding.
About.whatWeDo1: Interactive democracy quizzes in Bengali and English
About.whatWeDo2: Certificates for participants who pass the quiz
About.whatWeDo3: Clear explanations so you learn as you go
About.values2: Your vote shapes the future of Bangladesh.
About.values3: A few minutes of learning can change how you vote.
